title: The Savage's: A Savage Heart
description: Abigail Conners sent on a mission to execute one of the biggest names of the underworld. One last job... One last job, it shouldn't be that hard... Until she fell in love with the job. Lucas Savage, a man not to be crossed, is forced to lose all control over an assassin who has not only come to kill him, but has managed to get to his heart. Abigail must now choose between her job or the man who she has fallen in love with.  WARNING: THIS BOOK IS FOR READERS 18 YEARS AND OVER. IT CONTAINS MATERIAL OF SEX AND SUBMISSION AND VIOLENCE.
author: E.L. Beth
